QuestData.Title: Ellia Ravenmane: Rematch
QuestData.Description: Ellia Ravenmane requested a rematch with you. She seems to identify you as her "rival".$b$bWe discourage rivalries here within the Cradle of Chi-Ji, but we rarely decline a rematch request. You will find Ellia near the Pedestal of Hope, on the island's eastern side.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Ellia Ravenmane near the base of the Pedestal of Hope.
